src:
Prediksi Indonesia U-19 vs Timor Leste U-19 6 November 2019
06 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Timnas Indonesia U-19 akan menjamu Timor Leste U-19 dalam laga pembuka Grup K Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 2020. Pertandingan ini akan digelar di Stadion Madya, Kompleks Gelora Bung Karno, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Di atas kertas, laga ini sebenarnya tak terlalu sulit. Namun, tim asuhan Fakhri Husaini tetap tak boleh merasa jemawa.
Timnas Indonesia U-19 menatap Kualifikasi Piala AFC U-19 dengan persiapan panjang. Berbagai uji coba dilakukan, mulai dari melawan tim lokal hingga uji coba internasional.
Lawan yang dipilih pun tidak main-main. Timnas Indonesia U-19 berhasil meraih kemenangan melawan Iran dan China, dan juga harus mengakui kekalahan dari masing-masing lawan tersebut.
Artinya, secara kualitas bertanding Timnas Indonesia U-19 asuhan Fakhri Husaini sudah mampu bersaing. Hal itu yang membuat laga nanti sejatinya tak terlalu sulit buat Bagus Kahfi dkk.
Dalam level U-19, Timnas Indonesia juga punya catatan mentereng melawan tim dari negara yang pernah menjadi bagian dari Indonesia tersebut. Dalam tiga pertemuan terakhir, Tim Merah Putih menyapu bersih kemenangan dengan rincian mencetak 11 gol dan tak pernah kebobolan.
Berbekal catatan-catatan positif kontra Timor Leste dan persiapan matang, pelatih Fakhri Husaini diprediksi masih akan mengandalkan susunan pemain andalannya. Duet Bagus Kahfi dan Sutan Zico di lini depan bakal ditopang sokongan lini tengah yang dihuni Beckham Putra serta David Maulana.
Namun, Timor Leste tentu tak ingin hasil negatif melawan Timnas Indonesia U-19 terulang. Apalagi mereka berambisi untuk meraih tiket lolos langsung demi tampil perdana di Piala AFC U-19 2020.
Pelatih Eduardo Pereira diyakini akan mengandalkan skema 4-3-3 melawan Timnas Indonesia U-19. Timor Leste akan mengandalkan trisula Mouzinho Lima, Elias Mequita, dan Ejivanio da Costa yang siap menebar ancaman di depan gawang tuan rumah.
text:
Prediction of Indonesia U-19 vs Timor Leste U-19 6 November 2019
Nov 6 2019, 10:30 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian U-19 national team will host East Timor U-19 in the opening match of Group K AFC U-19 Qualification 2020. This match will be held at Madya Stadium, Gelora Bung Karno Complex, Wednesday (11/06/2019) .
On paper, this fight is actually not too difficult. However, Fakhri Husaini's care team still cannot feel empowered.
Indonesian U-19 national team looked at the AFC U-19 Cup Qualifiers with lengthy preparations. Various trials were carried out, ranging from fighting local teams to international trials.
Selected opponents are not kidding. The Indonesia U-19 national team won victories against Iran and China, and also had to admit defeat to each of the opponents.
That is, in terms of quality competing the Indonesian national team U-19 care of Fakhri Husaini was able to compete. That makes the fight later actually not too difficult for Bagus Kahfi et al.
In the U-19 level, the Indonesian national team also has a flashy record against a team from a country that was once part of Indonesia. In the last three meetings, the Red and White Team wiped out the victory with the details of scoring 11 goals and never conceding.
Armed with positive records against East Timor and careful preparation, coach Fakhri Husaini is predicted to still rely on the composition of its flagship players. Good duo Kahfi and Sutan Zico on the front lines will be supported by the midfield that is inhabited by Beckham Putra and David Maulana.
However, Timor Leste certainly does not want negative results against the U-19 Indonesian National Team repeated. Moreover, they are ambitious to win tickets directly pass for the first appearance in the AFC U-19 2020 Cup.
Coach Eduardo Pereira is believed to be relying on a 4-3-3 scheme against the Indonesian Under-19 national team. Timor Leste will rely on the trident of Mouzinho Lima, Elias Mequita and Ejivanio da Costa who are ready to spread threats in front of the host's goal.
